about_the_game:
This DLC is the original soundtrack of Abnormal Treatment.
Contains 12 original BGM tracks developed by the members of Eternal Dream Studio.

Bonus Content:

8 animated emoji GIFs of Carina, the protagonist of this game.

Where to Find:

  • You may need to restart Steam.
  • On the Steam Library page, click the game [异化之恶〇Abnormal Treatment].
    Right below the [FRIENDS WHO PLAY] section, you can see the [ADDITIONAL CONTENT] section.
  • Click [异化之恶〇Abnormal Treatment - OST], then you can enjoy the OST on Steam.
  • On the same page, you can also click [Browse Local Files] to find the OST + emoji GIF files on your computer.

Special Thanks:

Tracks 1 and 2, melodies from White Music House.
